description: Class F`s Akihisa Yoshii is one of the worst students at Fumizuki Academy. He probably doesn`t stand a chance in the Summoner Test War - but he`ll do his best for Mizuki Himeji!

titles.title: Baka to Class to Shoukan Sensou
Idiotas, Testes E Guerras De Seres!
Idiots, Classes, and the Summoner Test War
バカとクラスと召喚戦争
